department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Native American man standing in profile with a feathered shield with a fox, wearing fringed pants, moccasins and feathers in his hair, with mouth open; title at left in pencil; symbol in pencil at center right edge; "Song of the Tokala" at bottom in pencil; "9" stamped in black in URC on front--"10" stamped in black in ULC on back; verso:  text (list of names) written in brown ink
title: I am the Kit Fox, I Live in Uncertainty
